about_the_game:
As of 12/27/2022 we have changed hands and are proud to say we will attempt to include as much of the old content as possible, but we will be going about this an all new way that we hope will be much better, and will bring more interest to our game.



Chat
This is an important part of our game.
We have a chat system that is built to work differently with every language you choose to use. You are able to type in Common, and have your written words translated into any language we include in this program. the languages that you are able to select from may also be limited to players selected character, and the languages it knows. The second reason it will be important is because player to player communication often makes the game more interesting.



Journals:
We are attempting to allow players the ability to set custom notes for each or the players saved characters. this will be different to the quest system.



Dictionary:
we will be creating a dictionary that we hope will provide clarity to the different languages we offer.


This is a preview of what we currently hope to offer. We do plan to offer more stuff as people join us in our adventures!

name: Midget Kricket Fantasy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Additional Notes: Low end stress test not yet completed
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: I7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEforce 960
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are the specs the Program was built for, and i am aware that the program could use much lower specs.

short_description: Please wait while this get updated due to change of hands.
